name: UpdateHubspotCompany
description:
Update a company's details in HubSpot CRM using its ID.

Use this tool to update a company's information in HubSpot CRM by specifying the `companyId` or a unique property. Only existing and writable properties can be updated. Properties can be cleared by passing an empty string.

parameters.name: company_unique_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the company to be updated, either the companyId or a unique property value.

parameters.name: company_properties_update
parameters.description: A JSON object specifying the company property values to set or clear. Only existing and writable properties can be updated. Pass an empty string to clear a property.

properties.description: The company property values to set.

parameters.name: unique_property_name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the unique property used to identify the company.

value_schema.description: The name of a property whose values are unique for this object

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_crm API.

parameters.name: idProperty
parameters.description: The name of a property whose values are unique for this object

value_schema.description: The name of a property whose values are unique for this object

properties.description: The company property values to set.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
